itunes:title: #123 - Evolving Your Business with Elizabeth Dehn
title: #123 - Evolving Your Business with Elizabeth Dehn
description:
When it comes time to evolve and shift your business, how do you handle the transition gracefully without getting scattered and spread thin? Elizabeth Dehn of Beauty Bets joins us on the Being Boss Podcast to share her experience of building a successful beauty website and how she's working on expanding into podcasting and transitioning her content to focus on holistic healing and a little bit of woo. Sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting and Meet Edgar.

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
